Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_00>If I have to wait for my brother Izra, the
entire stable will be covered in grass.<sp:0:4:0>I think it'll probably be faster to look for
my brother Yolero...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>If I can't figure this out soon, there'll be
grass everywhere. Everywhere!
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>I wonder when my brother Izra will
come back...
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks to you, that nasty-looking monster
is gone.

Maybe I can relax from now on!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>But I really wish my brothers were
more useful...
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>S...<sp:5:0:0>sorry. I didn't mean to bother you.
You're probably really busy.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I've got two older brothers, but they
aren't here right now...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_01>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> but don't worry! I can do enough
work for the three of us!<sp:0:4:0>Please stop by Wetland Stable again
soon, OK?
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> you're back! Good morning!<sp:0:4:0>That nasty monster hasn't come back, so
there's nothing to worry about!
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> you're back! Hello!<sp:0:4:0>That nasty monster hasn't come back, so
there's nothing to worry about!
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> you're back! Good evening!<sp:0:4:0>That nasty monster hasn't come back, so
there's nothing to worry about!
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>That's strange... I wonder where my
brother Yolero ran off to...
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>It looks like my brother Yolero is slacking
off somewhere. As usual.<sp:0:4:0>The grass around the stable will get out of
control if we don't take care of it soon...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_01>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> but that's nothing for you to worry
about! Please take your time and relax.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Mr. Customer, you'll get wet out there!
Hurry, this way!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>It looks like my brother Yolero is slacking
off somewhere. As usual.<sp:0:4:0>I have no idea what he's even thinking,
being out in the rain and all.<sp:0:4:0>The grass around the stable will get out of
control if we don't take care of it soon...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice_01>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> but that's nothing for you to worry
about! Please take your time and relax.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>No more waiting! Today's the day I'm
going to find my brother Yolero and make
him clean up behind the stable!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>'Cause if I don't, the whole stable will
be covered in grass before we know it...
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>That nasty monster hasn't shown its face
around here again.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to you, I don't need to
worry anymore!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Everything would be perfect if my
brothers were more helpful...
Talk1027: <sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Is my brother Izra still over there?
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>My brother Izra won't be any help until
he's found the farming tools he lent to
Princess Zelda.
I guess I have to look for my brother
Yolero after all...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>At this rate, the stable will be covered in
grass before we know it.
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>It's just, um, things are a bit of a mess
around here, so I'd appreciate it if you
didn't look too closely.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I guess my brother Izra isn't coming back
until he finds the farming tools he lent to
Princess Zelda.
And I have to find my brother Yolero...
Wherever he ran off to.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>At this rate, the stable will be covered in
grass before we know it.
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>It's getting late, so looking for my brother
Yolero will have to wait.<sp:0:4:0>The area around the stable's a real mess.
I've definitely gotta find him tomorrow
so he can clean it up.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_01>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> but that's not your problem! Please,
go ahead and relax.
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Even with all the work to be done, my
brother Yolero is slacking off somewhere.<sp:0:4:0>The grass around the stable has gone
wild. If he doesn't come back to take
care of it soon...
And you know what loves rain like this?
Grass, that's what.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Yep! Izra and Yolero. They're no help
at all.<sp:0:4:0>Izra went looking for some farming tools
he lent to Princess Zelda...<sp:0:4:0>And Yolero is slacking off somewhere.
I haven't seen him around.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_01>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> but don't worry! I can do enough
work for the three of us!<sp:0:4:0>You can rely on Wetland Stable anytime
you're in the area.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Even with all the work to be done, my
brother Yolero is slacking off somewhere.<sp:0:4:0>The grass around the stable has gone
wild. If he doesn't come back to take
care of it soon...
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>It's just, um, things are a bit of a mess
around here, so I'd appreciate it if you
didn't look too closely.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>My brother Izra isn't going to be any
help until he finds his farming tools.<sp:0:4:0>I guess I'm going to have to look for my
brother Yolero after all...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>At this rate, the stable will be covered in
grass before we know it.
